note:
I like to explore the world through creativity when possible. I run dungeons and dragons games, paint miniatures, invent fantastic stories and situations to explore the human experience.

I take no sides in the conflict around me. I am a Canadian citizen, yet my heritage is Jewish, despite not practicing.

I feel very strongly about equality, understanding, breaking through past biases, environment, social issues, and I believe that the best path towards understanding is through play.
